title: Ticket #6913: condor_q -dag output not always grouped by DAG
description:
A support customer reports that the output of condor_q -dag does not always group dag nodes under the parent dagman job. The example given is this 

condor_q -dag output
-- Schedd: had-schedd@ : <138.127.204.65:9618?... @ 02/11/19 23:21:07

ID       OWNER/NODENAME                       SUBMITTED     RUN_TIME ST PRI SIZE    CMD
7067.0   pelletm                             5/2  17:40   5+00:14:22 I  0       0.0 (Condor Watchdog)
15818.0   pelletm                             2/11 15:29   0+07:51:10 R  0       0.3 condor_dagman -p 0 -f -l . -Lockfile optimize.dag.lock -AutoRescue 1 -DoRescueFrom 0 -Dag
15853.0    |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_AddRemap/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15843.0   pelletm                             2/11 20:31   0+02:49:24 R  0       0.3 condor_dagman -p 0 -f -l . -Lockfile optimize.dag.lock -AutoRescue 1 -DoRescueFrom 0 -Dag
15844.0    |-opt_AddRemap_Place               2/11 20:31   0+02:49:09 R  0    9766.0 (15843: opt_AddRemap/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15845.8    |-opt_Default_Place                2/11 20:31   0+02:49:09 R  0    9766.0 (15843: opt_Default/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15846.0    |-opt_Explore_Place                2/11 20:31   0+02:49:08 R  0    9766.0 (15843: opt_Explore/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
... etc ...
15852.4    |-place_ExtraNetDelay_high         2/11 20:32   0+01:49:33 R  -10  9766.0 (15843: opt_ExploreSequentialArea/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15852.5    |-place_ExtraNetDelay_high         2/11 20:32   0+01:46:31 R  -10   147.0 (15843: opt_ExploreWithRemap/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15852.6    |-place_ExtraNetDelay_high         2/11 20:32   0+01:35:26 R  -10  9766.0 (15843: opt_NoBramPowerOpt/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
*****
15852.7    |-place_ExtraNetDelay_high         2/11 20:32   0+01:31:28 R  -10  9766.0 (15843: opt_RuntimeOptimized/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15853.1    |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_AddRemap/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
*****
15853.6    |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_AddRemap/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15853.7    |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_AddRemap/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15853.8    |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_AddRemap/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15853.10   |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+01:09:33 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_ExploreSequentialArea/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
... etc ...
15853.47   |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+00:56:31 R  0    7325.0 (15818: opt_Default/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)
15853.48   |-PhysOptPostPlace_endhi           2/11 22:11   0+00:49:28 R  0       2.0 (15818: opt_Default/place_ExtraNetDelay_high/phys_opt_ExploreWithHoldFix)

123 jobs; 0 completed, 0 removed, 1 idle, 122 running, 0 held, 0 suspended

quote It seems to me that the 15818 jobs should be listed above, under the 15818 dagman's branches, even though they started later than the 15843 jobs. {endquote}
creator: johnkn
